name: Breaking B2B - SaaS Marketing and B2B Marketing Podcast
description:
Break free from sh*t SaaS and b2b marketing.
Join 1000s of legends tuning in weekly.
No background stories, BS or fluff. Tactical interviews with marketing leaders & practitioners. 
And solo episodes with specific strategies you can apply to your SaaS or b2b business today.
Voted a Top 10 B2B Marketing Podcast by Cognism, Fame, Goldcast, B2B Marketing World and more.
Try the daily newsletter and apply to work with us: https://www.breakingb2b.com/
Topics covered: SaaS marketing, b2b marketing, de

recent_episodes.title: #475 RIP Cold Email: Here’s What Works Now
recent_episodes.description:
📞 Wanna use SEO to generate revenue?  Book a call

 

► In today's episode Sam gets to the heart of why cold outreach is getting harder and harder to drive a consistent, sustainable flow of qualified leads for B2B and SaaS companies in 2026.

 

Here's what we cover: 

👉 Exactly why cold outreach is failing many B2B + SaaS Companies

👉 How to shift from cold outreach to organic inbound

👉 Unlocking the AI Search secrets that will attract your dream clients</

recent_episodes.title: #474 I Built a Full B2B SEO Strategy in 11 Minutes (LIVE)
recent_episodes.description:

►  Sam gets technical with Samu Kovacs. Learn how to use SEO most effectively to identify your ideal customer profile. Then use this data to tailor your SEO strategy more effectively.

 

We cover:

👉  Using Long-Tail Keywords for your Niche Market

👉  Targeting Low-Volume, High-Intent Keywords for SaaS

👉  Boosting SEO with your Long-Tail Keywords

👉  Bui

recent_episodes.title: #473 How This 19-Year-Old Built a $50k/Month B2B Business
recent_episodes.description:
📞 Wanna know how to use SEO + GEO to generate revenue right now? Book a call here: Book a call

 

► Want to know how to scale up your B2B business incredibly quickly? Sam talks to a fresh-faced Samu Kovacs who has done just that, netting $50k/Month in record time!

 

Samu's strategy includes:

 

👉   The push you need to take action

👉   Using case studies to chain high profile clients

👉   Dominate your niche - freelancing to build your portfolio

score_reason: Strong SaaS/B2B marketing focus with tactical interviews, relevant to Andreas's marketing expertise but less emphasis on traditional industries or deep AI strategy.
